June 26, 1886 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Quickstep Competition: 1st, £2, Black Dyke; 2nd, £1, Besses o' th' Barn Prizes: 20 guineas, 15 guineas, 8 guineas 6th annual contest 6 bands competed
Jan. 3, 2012, 12:38 p.m. Oct. 22, 2019, 1:10 p.m.
1 Black Dyke Band Alexander Owen Le Prophete - Introduction and Grand March [unknown arranger]
2 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
3 Wyke Edwin Swift L'Etoile du Nord [arr. Godfrey]
4 Honley Silver Band John Gladney Jnr Beethoven's Works [arr. Swift]
Unknown Result Leeds Forge Edwin Swift Tannhäuser [arr. Swift]
Unknown Result Oldham Rifles Band Alexander Owen Operatic Selection [unknown arranger]
